zero_lag_trend___bearish_put.name: ZERO LAG TREND - BEARISH PUT
zero_lag_trend___bearish_put.description: PineScript Zero Lag Trend Signals - BEARISH TREND SIGNAL ONLY. Enters PUT when trend changes from bullish to bearish (close crosses BELOW zlema-volatility). Exact replication of PineScript line 41: ta.crossunder(trend, 0). Uses Zero Lag EMA (70 period) + Volatility Bands (ATR 70, multiplier 1.2). Action hardcoded to 'put' - only enters PUT trades on bearish trend signals.

condition_groups.name: PUT_Zero_Lag_Bearish_Trend_Signal

conditions.description: ZLEMA: Zero Lag EMA calculated (lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34) - PINESCRIPT LINE 21
LAG: lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34 periods - PINESCRIPT LINE 19
ATR: Average True Range (70 periods) - PINESCRIPT LINE 23
VOLATILITY: highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2 - PINESCRIPT LINE 23
UPPER BAND: zlema + volatility - PINESCRIPT LINE 35
LOWER BAND: zlema - volatility - PINESCRIPT LINE 36
CROSSUNDER: close crosses BELOW (zlema - volatility) - PINESCRIPT LINE 30 - CRITICAL
TREND PREVIOUS: Previous trend was 1 (bullish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 27 - CRITICAL
TREND CURRENT: Current trend is -1 (bearish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 30-31 - CRITICAL
TREND CHANGE: trend crossunder from 1 to -1 (bullish to bearish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 41 - CRITICAL
BEARISH TREND SIGNAL: ta.crossunder(trend, 0) = TRUE - PINESCRIPT LINE 41 - MANDATORY
PRICE POSITION: Close is now BELOW (zlema - volatility) - CONFIRMS BEARISH TREND - CRITICAL
TREND CONFIRMED: Bearish trend confirmed (trend = -1) - MANDATORY
SIGNAL TYPE: Bearish Trend Signal (large arrow down) - PINESCRIPT LINE 41 - MANDATORY
CANDLE: Close < Open (bearish candle confirmation)
PRICE: Price falling (confirming bearish move)
CHANGE: Price change negative (downward movement)
MOMENTUM: Momentum direction DOWN (confirming trend)
NO CONFLICTS: No bullish signals present - CRITICAL
STRENGTH: Signal strength > 85 (strong bearish trend signal)

condition_groups.description: ZERO LAG TREND - BEARISH PUT. Exact PineScript replication. ZLEMA = EMA(close + (close - close[34]), 70) + volatility = highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2 + upper_band = zlema + volatility + lower_band = zlema - volatility. ENTRY SIGNAL (PINESCRIPT LINE 41): ta.crossunder(trend, 0) = close crosses BELOW (zlema - volatility) = trend changes from 1 to -1 (bullish to bearish) = BEARISH TREND SIGNAL = PUT. Previous trend 1 + current trend -1 + close < lower_band + trend crossunder confirmed + bearish trend signal TRUE + price below lower band + trend confirmed bearish + signal type Bearish Trend Signal + close < open + price falling + negative change + momentum DOWN + no conflicts + strength > 85. Requires 14 out of 20 conditions + 85% confidence. This is EXACT PineScript logic!

zero_lag_trend___bearish_put.notes: ZERO LAG TREND - BEARISH PUT ONLY. Exact replication of PineScript Zero Lag Trend Signals indicator by AlgoAlpha. ENTRY SIGNAL (PINESCRIPT LINE 41): ta.crossunder(trend, 0) which means trend changes from 1 (bullish) to -1 (bearish). This happens when close crosses BELOW (zlema - volatility). CALCULATIONS: ZLEMA = EMA(close + (close - close[34]), 70) where lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34. Volatility = highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2. Upper Band = zlema + volatility. Lower Band = zlema - volatility. TREND LOGIC: trend = 1 (bullish) when close crosses above upper band (LINE 27-28). trend = -1 (bearish) when close crosses below lower band (LINE 30-31). BEARISH TREND SIGNAL: Triggered when trend crossunder from 1 to -1 (LINE 41). This is the LARGE ARROW DOWN signal. Strategy enters PUT on this signal ONLY. Does NOT use the small entry arrows (LINE 45). Uses ONLY the bearish trend signal (large arrow). Expected: High win rate on strong trend changes. This is EXACT PineScript logic!

zero_lag_trend___bullish_call.name: ZERO LAG TREND - BULLISH CALL
zero_lag_trend___bullish_call.description: PineScript Zero Lag Trend Signals - BULLISH TREND SIGNAL ONLY. Enters CALL when trend changes from bearish to bullish (close crosses ABOVE zlema+volatility). Exact replication of PineScript line 42: ta.crossover(trend, 0). Uses Zero Lag EMA (70 period) + Volatility Bands (ATR 70, multiplier 1.2). Action hardcoded to 'call' - only enters CALL trades on bullish trend signals.

condition_groups.name: CALL_Zero_Lag_Bullish_Trend_Signal

conditions.description: ZLEMA: Zero Lag EMA calculated (lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34) - PINESCRIPT LINE 21
LAG: lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34 periods - PINESCRIPT LINE 19
ATR: Average True Range (70 periods) - PINESCRIPT LINE 23
VOLATILITY: highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2 - PINESCRIPT LINE 23
UPPER BAND: zlema + volatility - PINESCRIPT LINE 35
LOWER BAND: zlema - volatility - PINESCRIPT LINE 36
CROSSOVER: close crosses ABOVE (zlema + volatility) - PINESCRIPT LINE 27 - CRITICAL
TREND PREVIOUS: Previous trend was -1 (bearish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 30 - CRITICAL
TREND CURRENT: Current trend is 1 (bullish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 27-28 - CRITICAL
TREND CHANGE: trend crossover from -1 to 1 (bearish to bullish) - PINESCRIPT LINE 42 - CRITICAL
BULLISH TREND SIGNAL: ta.crossover(trend, 0) = TRUE - PINESCRIPT LINE 42 - MANDATORY
PRICE POSITION: Close is now ABOVE (zlema + volatility) - CONFIRMS BULLISH TREND - CRITICAL
TREND CONFIRMED: Bullish trend confirmed (trend = 1) - MANDATORY
SIGNAL TYPE: Bullish Trend Signal (large arrow up) - PINESCRIPT LINE 42 - MANDATORY
CANDLE: Close > Open (bullish candle confirmation)
PRICE: Price rising (confirming bullish move)
CHANGE: Price change positive (upward movement)
MOMENTUM: Momentum direction UP (confirming trend)
NO CONFLICTS: No bearish signals present - CRITICAL
STRENGTH: Signal strength > 85 (strong bullish trend signal)

condition_groups.description: ZERO LAG TREND - BULLISH CALL. Exact PineScript replication. ZLEMA = EMA(close + (close - close[34]), 70) + volatility = highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2 + upper_band = zlema + volatility + lower_band = zlema - volatility. ENTRY SIGNAL (PINESCRIPT LINE 42): ta.crossover(trend, 0) = close crosses ABOVE (zlema + volatility) = trend changes from -1 to 1 (bearish to bullish) = BULLISH TREND SIGNAL = CALL. Previous trend -1 + current trend 1 + close > upper_band + trend crossover confirmed + bullish trend signal TRUE + price above upper band + trend confirmed bullish + signal type Bullish Trend Signal + close > open + price rising + positive change + momentum UP + no conflicts + strength > 85. Requires 14 out of 20 conditions + 85% confidence. This is EXACT PineScript logic!

zero_lag_trend___bullish_call.notes: ZERO LAG TREND - BULLISH CALL ONLY. Exact replication of PineScript Zero Lag Trend Signals indicator by AlgoAlpha. ENTRY SIGNAL (PINESCRIPT LINE 42): ta.crossover(trend, 0) which means trend changes from -1 (bearish) to 1 (bullish). This happens when close crosses ABOVE (zlema + volatility). CALCULATIONS: ZLEMA = EMA(close + (close - close[34]), 70) where lag = floor((70-1)/2) = 34. Volatility = highest(ATR(70), 210) * 1.2. Upper Band = zlema + volatility. Lower Band = zlema - volatility. TREND LOGIC: trend = 1 (bullish) when close crosses above upper band (LINE 27-28). trend = -1 (bearish) when close crosses below lower band (LINE 30-31). BULLISH TREND SIGNAL: Triggered when trend crossover from -1 to 1 (LINE 42). This is the LARGE ARROW UP signal. Strategy enters CALL on this signal ONLY. Does NOT use the small entry arrows (LINE 44). Uses ONLY the bullish trend signal (large arrow). Expected: High win rate on strong trend changes. This is EXACT PineScript logic!
